1347954040118915073.text: This included local & state law enforcement & members of the National Guard. In the face of danger, they did everything they could to stop lawless criminals from taking over the Capitol & to protect the innocent lives inside. For this, I am forever grateful.

1347954038894112768.text: Indeed, law enforcement officers across the country risk their lives every day to keep all Americans safe from harm & to uphold the rule of law. In addition to members of the Capitol Police, I am grateful for those who rushed to provide reinforcement aid to secure the Capitol.

1347954037304532992.text: I am deeply saddened that the U.S. Capitol Police lost one of their own, Officer Brian Sicknick, who succumbed to injuries & passed away on Thursday night. As we mourn the loss of Officer Sicknick, please join me in lifting up his family, friends & loved ones in your prayers.

1347954036188831744.text: Just a few days ago, our nation's Capitol was under siege by an outrageous & violent mob. Faced with an unimaginable situation, brave members of law enforcement performed honorably & courageously to restore order & save lives.

1347954035144450050.text: Today on #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay, the selfless risks, heroism & sacrifices of our men & women in blue takes on sobering new meaning.

1346966808553807872.text: During a dangerous & frightening situation, I am incredibly grateful for the diligence & bravery of law enforcement, including the U.S. Capitol Police, risking their lives to keep members & staff safe.

1346966807257739264.text: Such shameful behavior runs contrary to upholding and respecting the constitutional rule of law & threatens the preservation of our great Republic. This is not the American way.

1346966806100123648.text: I am outraged by the lawless protests that unfolded at the U.S. Capitol today. While Americans have the right to passionately voice their views & peacefully dissent in protest, I strongly condemn the perpetrators of this destructive & violent activity.

They have asked me to express their concerns with my vote on the floor today, & as their representative, I intend to do so.

1346892071047753729.text: The greatest function of a representative is being elected to represent the views of one’s constituency. I have been closely studying this issue & listening intently to what my constituents have to say.

1346892070057877504.text: On behalf of my constituents, I am casting my vote against certification of the Electoral College’s count of the presidential election results.

1151257581920432129.text: Americans who have different opinions are not racists. They are just Americans who have different opinions. Let’s respect one another more, disparage one another less and heal our land.

1151257581240930305.text: It is time to dial down the rhetoric on both sides and restore civility to the House floor and our national dialogue.

1151257580494348289.text: The result? Speaker Pelosi’s remarks of the floor were ruled out of order this afternoon, and the House was plunged into chaos.
